title: 26 25 26 "Stranded""Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!"Transliteration: "Zefu to Sanji no Yume Maboroshi no Ōruburū" (Japanese:ゼフとサンジの夢·幻のオールブルー) Mitsuru Shimada Munehisa Sakai 713.1 May 24, 2000(2000-05-24)[49] March 19, 2005[50]
transformers_text:
26 25 26 "Stranded""Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!"Transliteration: "Zefu to Sanji no Yume Maboroshi no Ōruburū" (Japanese:ゼフとサンジの夢·幻のオールブルー) Mitsuru Shimada Munehisa Sakai 713.1 May 24, 2000(2000-05-24)[49] March 19, 2005[50]

With Zeff held captive by Gin, Sanji has no choice but to take Pearl's hits. He reveals that he worked on a cruise ship that Zeff attacked, and when a storm hit, the two were the only survivors. Zeff sacrificed his leg to save Sanji and gave Sanji food, as both shared the same dream of finding the legendary ocean, All Blue - supposedly a place where the four seas meet and all the world's sealife intermingles. No longer able to fight with his legs and be a pirate, Zeff founded the Baratie. Sanji claims that he will defend the Baratie with his life, and an enraged Luffy responds by attacking the ship's porch with Gum-Gum Axe.
